snippet: The Los Angeles rapper Schoolboy Q, whose major-label debut album just topped the Billboard chart, performed at Best Buy Theater on Tuesday night.
abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by Los Angeles rapper Schoolboy Q at Best Buy Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles rapper Schoolboy Q, whose major-label debut album just topped the Billboard chart, performed at Best Buy Theater on Tuesday night.

headline.print_headline: A Hip-Hop Everyman, Pumped Up for a Star Turn With a Top Album
headline.seo: Schoolboy Q, With Chart-Topping ‘Oxymoron,’ at Best Buy Theater
headline.main: A Hip-Hop Everyman, Pumped Up for a Star Turn With a Top Album
